author: Miguel Lugo
comment: Images and videos are not always shown. Only 1 of every 5 pics or videos are shown. The official whatsapp app can handle replying already. Inquiries for support has been ignored.

author: Arkadi Raider
comment: Silence night doesn't work on samsung note 3 / lollipop. The watch vibrates on charge cradle. Please add an option that puts message on screen like android wear messages. If I missed the message I should see it without touching the watch. Thank you!

author: trilok saini
comment: Images and videos not opening,please help,please update the app.

author: Yap Hock Heng
comment: However too many steps to reply. A few things to improve on: 1) should allow for selection of default way to reply. 2) should use normal T9 layout. The current keyboard layout is unconventional and confusing. 3) keyboard should auto switch between caps and non-caps alphabet like all other keyboards.

reply.author: Go Tic Apps Solutions S.L.
reply.content:
Hello Yap ,
Do not worry because we really like this project and will continue to work on improving it. Our next mission will be hit hard by chathead .
A greeting.
Thanks

title: Can reply via chatheads! A few more to five stars!!!

author: Firas Ghazal
comment: How about you add an option of sending a voice note, that would give you a 5 start for sure

reply.author: Go Tic Apps Solutions S.L.
reply.content: Thanks Firas for your comment!!! Good idea!!!

author: Irving Hernandez
comment: Hey. El app dice que conectando pero no pasa nada ni aparece nada. Tengo el Moto 360 y el galaxy Note 5. Que pasos debo seguir para que funcione en el motor 360

reply.author: Go Tic Apps Solutions S.L.
reply.content: Hola Irving , [¿ACT: Hay noticias nuevas?] podemos hacer una cosa. Enciende la app en el teléfono y seguidamente enciende la app del reloj. Si se cierra dando un error entonces envíanos ese error para saber que está pasando. Si por el contrario no se cierra, reinicio ambos y prueba de nuevo. Info@goticapp.com

reply.content:
Hello Saketh
It may be a connection problem with the terminal , but we'd dig a little deeper and find out the reason for the error. info@goticapp.com and help you in whatever you need .
THANK YOU

title: Can't operate anything

author: Andy Mac
comment: Everything works except when i go to reply i cannot reply with whatsapp it says reply SMS so i have to use text (SMS) messages to reply and then my messages do not show up on the watch as replies alls i see is the incoming messages?

reply.content:
Thanks Andy!!!
Now you can reply with WhatsApp with the next version.
Thanks
